title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
OB: Currently, when including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design.
3. Add a library to the report design.
4. Save the report design.
5. Close the BIRT designer.
6. Re-open the report design.
7. Check the path of the included library to see if it is stored as a relative path.
